content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I used the "browse_website" command to find the best route for the Brno Reservoir trail on the AllTrails website. However, the command returned an error with no text to summarize.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "best hiking route Brno Reservoir trail"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command google returned: ["https://www.alltrails.com/czech-republic/south-moravian/brno", "https://greatruns.com/brno-czechia-brno-reservoir-veveri-castle/", "https://www.alltrails.com/en-gb/czech-republic/south-moravian/brno", "http://experienceeurope.eu/hiking-in-brno-my-top-5/", "https://www.alltrails.com/czech-republic/south-moravian", "https://www.outdooractive.com/mobile/en/route/hiking-route/czech-republic/brno-reservoir/29020361/", "https://www.komoot.com/highlight/120564", "https://www.outdooractive.com/mobile/en/hikes/jihomoravsky-kraj/hikes-in-jihomoravsky-kraj/1441350/"]', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://greatruns.com/brno-czechia-brno-reservoir-veveri-castle/", "question": "What is the best route to take on the Brno Reservoir trail?"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: providing information on running routes in the Brno Reservoir area in Czechia. While there is no loop trail around the entire reservoir, there are sections of waterfront path or roadside sidewalk. The article maps out 8 km of the most suitable running in the reservoir area, with rolling hills. The top end of the reservoir around U Sirky beach is a good area to start, and there is bus access. Additionally, there are a couple of decent options for running near the 13th-century Veveří Castle, located a few km west of the reservoir.\n\nLinks: ['About (https://greatruns.com/about/)', 'About Great Runs (https://greatruns.com/about/)', 'Great Runs Team (https://greatruns.com/great-runs-team/)', 'Working With Great Runs (https://greatruns.com/working-with-great-runs/)', 'GR in the Media (https://greatruns.com/as-seen-in/)']", type='action_result')]
"""
